title: Unfinished Sketch of Mountain Range
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
description: light, unfinished sketch of mountains along horizon. Some foreground detail, tiny bit of sky detail, both on left.
name: Sketchbook folio
